rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ASP4210}

description: ASP4210 and ASP4220 together, are equivalent to ASP4200 butthey enable students to study part time by allowing completion of the work over a longer time period.Students are required to select three sub-units (covering advanced coursework topics) from offerings within the School ofPhysics and Astronomy. These sub-units are to be selected in consultation with the student's academic supervisor. Some subunitsmay be chosen from outside the School - with permission from the honours coordinator.Students will also complete a literature review related to the research project component of their honours course.
